title: Interpretation of seeing a kite in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a kite in a dream through the website roy2a.com, the kite is one of the birds of prey that feeds on mice, birds, and small animals. It is distinguished by its sharp vision and its voice that can be heard from long distances. Seeing a kite in a dream is a dream that raises doubts in the dreamer, as it has good or bad connotations, so we will put in this article everything that the great dream interpreters scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen have stated about it for single, married and pregnant women, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream. A kite in a dream is a very good sign and soon the fortuneteller will enjoy it. A kite in a dream is also considered a man’s sign of good character and religion or obedient chastity to her husband. Seeing a large number of small kittens in a dream around the dreamer indicates that there are enemies lurking around him and who want to catch him. To dream of chasing a kite. The fortuneteller earns his money by acquiring halal money. As for seeing small kites in a dream? It is a reference to the individual. Seeing a kite on his head in a dream is a sign of the expiration of this person. Dreaming of carrying a kite is a sign that you are earning a lot of money. It also indicates the presence of a kite in a dream in conflicts and battles. A kite flying in a sick person’s dream indicates his death. A married man cutting the wings of a kite in a dream indicates his control over his wife and his control over everything. See also: Interpretation of seeing I’tikaf in a dream. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream. By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a kite in a dream symbolizes power, control and empowerment. Seeing a kite in a dream indicates theft or the presence of thieves around the fortuneteller and he should be careful. Seeing a kite flying in a dream means conflicts, wars and battles. A kitten in a dream is a symbol of an unjust ruler who violated the rights of His people.Seeing a kite that was caught in a dream indicates thatthen the rejection of my opinions shows the loss of a loved one.The black kite in a man’s dreamindicating the presence of an unfaithful woman in his life.See also:Interpretation of seeing a barbecue in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a kite in a dream for a single womanSeeing a kite In one dream, it is a sign of a young man’s progress in creating debts for her soon. If you see a kite chasing an unmarried woman in your dream, this indicates that he will get what he is looking for. A meat kitten in a girl’s dream is a sign that she is receiving good news and turning her life for the better. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream For a married woman: A kite for a married woman in a dream shows abundant livelihood and a lot of money that she will get in the near future. Seeing a kite running away in a dream from a married woman and its escape shows a separation between her and her husband. Killing a kite in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she is in control of her husband and her home and is in control of them. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a kite on a pregnant woman’s head in a dream indicates the gender of her child, which is male.

title: Is a snake in a dream sorcery according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: It is a snake in a dream. It is magic by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Nabulsi. Seeing a snake in a dream is one of the dreams that a person sees during his sleep, and feels afraid of it. Although this vision is scary, it has some wonderful signs that bode well, and some information that was received indicates that seeing a snake In a dream, it means that the person who saw this vision has been exposed to witchcraft, and we will confirm this topic through this article as follows. Is a snake in a dream sorcery according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi? Seeing a snake in a dream is a frightening vision that has an ominous character for the dreamer, and despite This vision portends bad news, but some interpretations of it carry good tidings and talk about whether seeing snakes in a dream is something magical. This information is almost correct, as stated in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Nabulsi, that seeing a black snake in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is... With the jinn and touching, and that there are those who are trying to do magic. What is the interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream? Seeing a black snake in a dream is considered one of the bad dreams that have disturbing and disturbing interpretations, and we will study with you the most important interpretations related to this vision as follows: There is an evil woman who wants to perform magic on you. The viewer is betrayed by someone close to him. Seeing a snake in a dream means that the people around you are rushing you to their gatherings. If you see yourself killing a black snake in a dream, this means that you will break the power of those who seek to harm you. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black snake chasing me? According to the interpretations contained in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation related to the dream of seeing a black snake chasing the monarch, this indicates that the fortuneteller has deviated from religion and indulged in sins and is carrying out hostile acts that are harmful to God. And there are people around him, and it is a sign from God that you must repent and turn away from the path you have taken, which leads you to transgressions and sins. It is a snake in a dream, magic by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Nabulsi in the video. We consider with you the interpretation of seeing a snake through a video clip as follows: What is the interpretation of seeing a snake? In a dream for comfort? There are many interpretations related to seeing a snake in a dream for a single woman, some of which carry an ominous portent, and we will study these interpretations for you as follows: Seeing a snake in a dream means that the friend who is accompanied by the single woman is a corrupt friend. The dream indicates that this The girl will be betrayed by someone close to her. The dream in which she sees a snake indicates that someone is trying to cause harm through magic. It indicates some parties that will surround the dreamer in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman. There are different interpretations of Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation for a pregnant woman. She sees a snake in her dream, and we will deal with this package of interpretations as follows: This vision indicates that this woman will suffer from health problems during pregnancy. It shows that she will face some difficulties in the delivery process. It indicates that she was subjected to witchcraft during her pregnancy. Here we come to The end of this article titled E

title: How do you know the symbols and associations of jealousy in a dream?

preview.html: Many dreams and visions are interpreted as the presence of an envious or envious person close to the dreamer, but here comes the question: How do you recognize an envious person in a dream??? .. There are many symbols and hints that appear in a dream to explain or indicate envy. Here in this article we will tell you some symbols that explain how to recognize a jealous person in a dream? How do you recognize an envious person in a dream? There are many symbols and signs that may appear in a dream. The vision indicates the presence of envy or someone who wishes to harm the dreamer. Seeing someone in a dream looking at the fortuneteller and looking at him with a strange look is a symbol of envy. You will likely see someone trying to take and steal food from the fortuneteller, either eating it or throwing it in the trash. This vision is one of the symbols that indicate the presence of envy and perhaps magic and actions. Seeing a person in a dream trying to cause harm and evil to God, especially by wounding him with a knife and stabbing him with it. There are some actions that a jealous person can do in a dream, which indicates that he feels jealous and hates the dreamer. Such as sabotaging and spoiling the viewer’s property, such as his home, etc. Seeing broken glass in a dream spread throughout the house indicates the presence of envy. Seeing a fire burning in the house is a sign of envy for that house and its people. There is another sign that may appear, which is seeing a person approaching the fortuneteller and then taking the form Suddenly a snake. This vision is not praiseworthy because it indicates this person’s bad faith and his intention to harm, evil, and harm the dreamer. Seeing a person wearing clothes associated with the Jewish religion is a clear symbol of evil and envy. In addition to seeing a person smiling at the fortuneteller with a fake, embarrassing, and malicious smile, these are symbols Clear for evil and evil. See also: Names of people who point to the eye. Watch the video How to meet envy in a dream

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a bride without a groom in a dream

preview.html: I dream of a bride without a groom. Weddings are among the things that show joy in life and many girls and young men may look forward to them, but they often do not have the same meaning when seen in dreams, as they can be a sign of sadness, death, or joy. And many other different meanings, which vary according to the vision and the situation in which it comes, and through this article we will learn about the best interpretations that came from seeing the bride without her groom with her in a dream and its meaning. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations that you are looking for. Interpretation of wearing Wedding dress: If she sees that she is preparing for a wedding and is wearing her dress, but she is walking alone, then this is evidence that there are many changes awaiting the dreamer, and she may enter a new life, and perhaps this indicates marriage in the near future, God willing, or commitment. If he sees that she is already attending without being He has a husband, this indicates a high status, gaining a prominent position in society, and also indicates a promotion in the field of work. If you see that he is preparing to attend the wedding, dancing and singing, this is a sign of his falling into trouble and worries, and it may indicate crises, anxiety, or hearing news. Bad, and it is one of the dreamer’s unpleasant dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a bride without a groom: To see that she is going to a private wedding for her relative, and there was no groom, this is evidence of problems, distress, and a bad psychological state for the woman who saw the bride in her dream. If there is a lot of singing and music, and she finds A woman without a man to marry her, this indicates the death of a relative or a family member, and it is also great sadness and distress for the dreamer or whoever shares the vision, and God knows best. Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of a bride without a groom in a dream as An indication that he has made many decisive decisions regarding many important matters in his life. If someone sees a bride without a groom in his dream, this is a sign of positive changes that will occur in his life in the coming days and will give him great satisfaction. In the event that the dreamer sees the bride during his sleep Without a groom, this expresses good things that will happen around him, which will help him improve his situation a lot than before. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about the bride without a groom symbolizes his ability to achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time, and this will put him in a state of great happiness. If a man sees a bride without a groom in his dream, this is a sign that he received a big promotion in his workplace to appreciate the great efforts he made to develop it. Seeing a bride without a groom in a single woman’s dream. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about herself as a bride without the presence of the groom and there was noise. Very high means that she will be exposed to many bad events that will make her not in a good psychological state. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is a bride without the presence of the groom, this is a sign of her ability to achieve many things that she has always dreamed of, and this will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is Bride Do

title: Interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream is one of the visions that indicate many good things and livelihood. Seeing bags of wheat in a dream indicates an increase in the money that the dreamer will obtain. Also, the interpretation of a dream about wet wheat in a dream shows a diet with it. A lot of money, with ease and without fatigue. The interpretation of dreaming of wheat in a dream is one of the good visions that show goodness, money and good health. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing barley in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream for a single woman. Seeing wheat in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates The happiness and joys that the girl will have in her coming life. Wheat is one of the visions that indicate that she heard good and happy news. A wheat farm in the dream of an unmarried girl is news that she will marry a good man in the coming days. Also, seeing wheat in general in a woman’s dream is not For a married woman, it indicates the fulfillment of the goals and desires that the girl seeks from God. See also: Interpretation of seeing bread (alive) in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream for a married woman. A dream about grinding wheat refers to a married woman, as it indicates the arrival of goodness and a lot of livelihood that she and her husband will receive. The presence of the husband in the dream working inside a wheat farm is one of the visions that indicate the future means of livelihood for the husband, which will make their lives happier. Walking on wheat fields in a married woman’s dream is one of the good dreams that indicates the end of problems and worries. See also: Interpretation of a dream about kneading dough In a dream, the interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream of a pregnant woman harvesting wheat indicates safety and indicates the ease of childbirth without problems. Seeing boiled wheat in a dream and eating it and having a good taste is one of the visions that portends well many good things that the pregnant woman will get in her next life. For a pregnant woman, buying wheat from a man in a dream is a harbinger of a lot of sustenance that the husband will receive, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing wheat in a dream for a man: Seeing a man harvesting wheat in his dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates the arrival of a lot of wealth and money that he will obtain in his next life. And walking in Wheat fields and walking indicate the arrival of happiness and pleasure for a person, and good omens and good circumstances. Wheat in general in a man’s dream is one of the visions that portend goodness, happiness, and peace of mind, as it indicates the satisfaction of desires, and is considered one of the visions worthy of praise. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an oven in a dream. Interpretation Seeing bags of wheat in a dream: The interpretation of seeing a heavy bag of wheat in a dream indicates heavy loads and burdens on the dreamer. Buying a bag of wheat in a dream is a promising dream for the dreamer to restore the truth and get rid of his worries and problems. Also, seeing many bags of wheat in a dream is a sign of gathering goodness. And abundance of livelihood for the dreamer in his life. Seeing boiled wheat in a dream Seeing boiled wheat in a dream is one of the promising visions of many benefits and a significant improvement in the dreamer’s circumstances.

title: Interpretation of the dream of cleaning the kitchen by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of a dream about cleaning the kitchen by Ibn Sirin in a dream for single and married women. This dream is accompanied by the social status that the dreamer was in when he saw this dream, and through this article we will learn about Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about cleaning the kitchen and all the interpretations and signs related to it. Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning the kitchen in a dream by Ibn Sirin The kitchen is one of the most important basic elements in the home for all women, which is why they care about cleaning it to appear in a beautiful image, and when they see it in a dream, it has many different interpretations and interpretations. It is summarized in several different points, which are as follows: Ibn Sirin's saying in seeing a tidy kitchen was one of the signs of the safety of the visionary. Likewise, this vision is a sign of the wisdom and intelligence that the visionary possesses in managing the affairs of his life and dealing with all the crises he faces. Likewise, seeing the kitchen in a dream is one of the visions that indicate kindness and abundant nutrition, which the visionary will provide them in the near future. See also: Interpretation of dreams of arranging clothes for single, married and pregnant women Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning the kitchen in a dream for a single woman Seeing the kitchen in the dream of an unmarried girl is also one of the most important visions that indicate her goals in life, and since she will be able to achieve all the goals she seeks to achieve, in addition to many other meanings and interpretations. Based on the details related to the dream, and as the interpretation of the vision of cleaning the kitchen in the dream of an unmarried girl is manifested as follows: Seeing a single girl cleaning a dirty kitchen is an indication of the problems and obstacles she faces in life. While if the unmarried girl is seen cleaning the kitchen, this is evidence of all her efforts to get rid of the obstacles and problems she faces in life. Likewise, the cleanliness of the kitchen in the dream of an unmarried girl is evidence of the stability of her psychological state, as well as the feeling of calm and the ability to face all life's problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream for an unmarried woman Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the kitchen in a dream for a married woman The kitchen is also one of the most important things for a woman, and it has a fundamental and pivotal role in the life of a married woman, as it provides all the comforts, and since seeing it in a dream, it has many different interpretations. And the indications that are summarized in several different points, we list them as follows: If a married woman sees herself cleaning the kitchen in a dream, it is one of the visions that indicate the stability of her marital life and an indication of the abundance of her livelihood and the removal of all the worries and obstacles that stand in her way. On the way to her relationship with her husband. And if a married woman dreams of seeing a spacious and clean kitchen in a dream, then this vision is a sign of abundance of kindness and abundant nutrition, as well as an indication of improvement and stability of material affairs. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing freckles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing freckles in a dream for a married woman. Freckles in a dream indicate a lot of money and may indicate that the dreamer will get into a lot of trouble. It may indicate that the dreamer has committed sins and disobedience. Interpretation of the dream from seeing freckles in a dream and what indicates good and evil and knowing the interpretation. Freckles for married, pregnant and single women Freckles are brown spots that usually appear on the face and hands. They are common in many people, especially those with red and blond hair, and most of them are inherited. It does not pose any threat to public health and can be removed and disposed of by laser and some other methods. It often appears in the summer and this is something we are used to seeing, but it is not uncommon to see freckles in a dream and we must see freckles in a dream that carry many signs and indicators that we will talk about in detail in this article, the interpretation of a dream about seeing freckles in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about freckles by Ibn Sirin: According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the appearance of freckles and spots indicates sins, transgressions, and the possibility of slaughter. Seeing freckles in a dream can also mean that the dreamer will encounter many difficult problems and will not be able to solve them. Dream interpretation of many freckles in a dream is evidence You will get a lot of money and survive. The interpretation of seeing freckles on a child’s face in a dream interprets kindness, grace, and comfort after distress. Ibn Sirin explains the dream of freckles on the skin of a deceased person in a dream, referring to the evil and sins of this deceased person. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a person with them Freckles in a dream indicate their absence and gossip. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing freckles in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of the appearance of freckles by Al-Nabulsi: Seeing freckles and their beautiful shape in a dream is a sign of good news and we wish you success. Interpretation of a dream about a face disfigured by freckles in a dream indicates lies and hypocrisy. Dreaming of black freckles in the cheeks area in a dream indicates a great debt. Seeing severe and ugly freckles in a dream indicates bad and inappropriate behavior of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing freckles for a man: A man seeing freckles in a dream indicates sins and transgressions. Interpretation of a dream about freckles indicates in A man’s dream also indicates self-doubt and lack of confidence. A man who sees himself removing freckles and getting rid of them in a dream portends a bright future and good luck. Seeing freckles on a man’s body in a dream indicates the presence of a disabled woman. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boil in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about freckles for a woman Married woman: Interpretation of seeing freckles or black spots in a dream for a married woman. Whether these spots are on the face or body, they are an indication of many problems and bad behavior. Dreaming of freckles in a dream for a married woman indicates gossip and backbiting. Seeing black spots in a married woman’s dream also symbolizes To some sins, including gossiping and theft. Seeing freckles on a child’s face in a dream for a married woman is good news and a blessing. Dreaming of freckles on the face of a dead person in a dream for a married woman indicates the disappearance of fears and problems. Seeing freckles removed in a dream

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about his saying: “God is sufficient for us and He is the best disposer of affairs”?

preview.html: It is enough for us to say, “God is the best agent” in a dream. We all turn to God Almighty in times of prosperity and adversity to thank Him for the blessings or to pray to pass the difficult and bad times that we suffer. The dream? It is enough for us to say, “God is the best disposer of affairs” in the dream. The interpretation of the dream that says “God is sufficient for me, and He is the best disposer of affairs” confirms that there are many things that the dreamer desires to happen and that he often prays to God Almighty. Saying “God is sufficient for me, and He is the best disposer of affairs” in the dream appears Some signs related to psychological stress, and this is if the person is crying or screaming, and there may be difficult times in which you will continue to haunt him. . And if you say this prayer while you are really sick, the interpretation means that there is a close opportunity to heal and get rid of what is hurting you and hurting you in your body. Saying “God is sufficient and He is the best disposer of affairs” in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin guides us to the fact that saying “God is sufficient for me and He is the best disposer of affairs” in the vision represents the hope that It shines in a person’s life after its absence and delay, and so the dream indicates avoiding despair and suffering, in addition to restoring. With health and comfort, God willing. Ibn Sirin believes that God is sufficient and is the best actor in a dream. It indicates goodness in general, but it can have difficult interpretations if a person is severely affected in his dream and suffers great injustice. Enter the Dream Interpretation website online from Google And search for all the interpretations that you are looking for. It is enough for us to say, “God is the best disposer of affairs” in a single woman’s dream. When a girl says in her dream, “God is sufficient and He is the best disposer of affairs,” then the interpretation is related to some psychological states. But if the unmarried woman is going through a state of distress and loss, and she prays to God Almighty, then God It is enough for me, and He is the best agent. She will suffer harm, meaning someone stole her right and caused it. Losing her dreams. It is enough for me to say, “God is the best agent” in a dream while I cry for single people. It can be said that God is sufficient, and He is the best agent. Through crying in a dream for a girl, it expresses many of the difficulties that she controls at that time, and envy can be one of its causes, which It creates difficult days and turbulent events. In her life, that will not be good for her. It is enough for us to say, “God is the best agent” in a married woman’s dream. Sometimes a married woman hears herself praying to God in her dream and hesitates, “God is sufficient for me and I am the best agent,” and the dream translates into thinking about God Almighty and not persecuting anyone around her, because she Always be patient with her. She is careful not to return evil to those who push her to her, and this indicates her strong faith. Praying to God and the best agent in the woman’s dream confirms that she often tells him in reality as her worries increase, even if she complains about the difficulty of pregnancy or her husband’s injustice towards her and she says that in her dream, so it expresses her With relief and removes harm from her. It is enough for me to say, “God is the best disposer of affairs” in a dream while I cry for the married woman. If the woman sees her crying in a dream, with many sayings, “God is sufficient for me, and He is the best disposer of affairs,” then God comforts her in some of the crises and problems that she faces, whether they are psychological or Psychological. Matter.. is the best and removes the evil of the world from its freshness

title: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream, the meaning of light rain in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about rain in a girl’s dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, heavy rain. Seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing rain in a dream is a good and good omen and it is abundant food. Seeing light rain in a dream means happiness, joy and upcoming money. Seeing rain accompanied by thunder and lightning means that trouble will come and danger will surround. With this person. And if a person sees in his dream that this rain is accompanied by thunder and lightning and it falls in one place, this indicates that the people of this house are affected by worry, sadness, and grief. As for the person who sees rain falling in a dream, this rain causes danger, such as the fall of buildings or floods and injury. People and causing harm due to rain, it means the emergence of problems and difficulties such as war, famine, and earthquakes. And other natural disasters and calamities that can harm the country without human intervention. As for someone who sees in a dream that rain falling from a window or door, this means that that person is safe and in complete security, and seeing the rain falling while the sun is shining is an indication that his troubles are over. person. And sorrows, and there is benefit coming his way for that person. In general, Ibn Sirin says about rain falling in a dream that it is an indication that there are people who are loyal and loving to that person. Seeing rain in an unmarried girl’s dream Rain in an unmarried woman’s dream means that there is a new love or A good relationship or her association with a person with noble and religious morals, who is diligent in his work and honest in everything he does. A single girl’s dream of rain accompanied by thunder and lightning may indicate the arrival of many difficulties that will make her shake her sense of security and lose her trust in those around her. Seeing light rain in a single girl’s dream means Hearing beautiful words makes her heart happy, and heavy rain means strong feelings that she has towards a specific person she loves. Seeing rain in a married woman’s dream. Rain in a married woman’s dream means that good and abundant food comes to her. It expresses the happiness and joy that fills her being. It is possible that rain in a married woman’s dream indicates She will become pregnant soon. It indicates the kindness of this wife. The rain may symbolize a prayer answered by this woman. It may indicate the recovery of the husband if he is sick. Seeing rain in a pregnant woman’s dream. Scientists said that a pregnant woman’s dream of rain indicates an abundance of kindness and an answer to prayers. There is evidence that this woman’s birth will be easy. Rain in The dream of a pregnant woman represents the safety of that woman, the safety of her fetus, and the safety of his parents. It may mean that she will give birth to a good son from his parents. Seeing light rain in a dream. Light rain in a dream means that this person will hear beautiful words that have an impact on this person’s heart from someone he knows and loves. Light rain is safety and peace. From harm and danger if that person is facing a problem or something he is afraid of. Light rain symbolizes an answered prayer or comfort. Seeing light rain in a dream is considered a mercy from a difficult situation and a long-term problem for that person. In general, light rain in a dream can mean marriage or engagement, sexual intercourse, and joy. And success, which is a good and good omen. Seeing pain

Seeing light rain in the dream of a single girl means hearing beautiful words that make her heart happy, and heavy rain means strong feelings she has towards a specific person she loves. There is an indication that this woman's birth will be easy. Rain in a pregnant woman's dream represents the safety of that woman, the safety of her fetus, and the safety of his parents. It may mean that she will give birth to a righteous son from his parents. Seeing light rain in a dream. Light rain in a dream means that this person will hear beautiful words that have an impact on this person's heart from someone he knows and loves. Light rain is safety and peace from harm and danger if that person is facing a problem or something he fears. Light rain symbolizes answered prayers or comfort. Seeing light rain in a dream is considered mercy from a difficult situation and a long-standing problem for this person. In general, light rain in a dream can mean marriage or engagement, sexual intercourse, joy, and success, and it is a good and good omen.
